response.job_title: Ph.D. Student at University of Colorado, Boulder - Leave of Absence
response.skills: Análisis de sistemas, Investigación y desarrollo, Diseño de circuitos analógicos, Instrumentación electrónica, Diseño de sistemas de control, Research and Development (R&D), Analog Circuit Design, Electronic Instrumentation, Measurement System Analysis, Control Systems Design, Critical Thinking, Decision-Making, Team Leadership

company.name: IAV GmbH
company.description:
We develop the mobility of the future. As one of the leading global developers of innovative technology, we have been working with the big names in the automotive and mobility industry for a long time. In addition, our work extends to other areas such as robotics, agriculture, energy, and water management.

We act on the guiding principle of moving the world for the better through technology and engineering. Our goal is to continuously make mobility more sustainable, more intelligent, and safer. And to make it more digital, more connected, and simply better for all of us.

To make this happen, we combine automotive know-how with IT expertise. By combining vehicle and powertrain development with the development of software systems, IAV offers a unique range of expertise for the development of end-to-end mobility solutions.

Thanks to an unparalleled spectrum of projects, you will never get bored with us. Thrive in an environment equipped with a first-class technical infrastructure, where you will meet inquisitive minds, creative freedom, and an open-minded team. And where you'll find the career opportunities that are a perfect fit for you.

Be a part of IAV and help shape the mobility of the future – in a setting characterized by inquiring minds and equipped with high-end testing infrastructure. 

We look forward to welcoming you!
